title: Design and Optimization of Metamaterial-Based IoT Sensor Systems for Large-Scale Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of IoT systems, wireless signal processing basics, and machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Science education methodology linkage program for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the physical structure of metamaterial sensors and their environmental detection principles.
Learners can apply a design process for IoT sensor systems using deep learning-based optimization algorithms.
Learners can simulate a multi-environment condition (temperature/humidity) measurement system using signal reflection methods.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
